source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a dramatic landscape scenery shot capturing a massive, turbulent storm system moving across a vast, flat prairie. The sky is dominated by a swirling, layered supercell cloud, with dark, ominous gray and teal tones contrasting with brighter white sections above. Sheets of rain are visible falling in the distance, partially obscuring a sliver of golden light on the far horizon. There is no main subject, as the focus is on the immense scale and powerful atmosphere of the weather phenomenon itself, dwarfing the expansive, grassy landscape below.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt:
The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject. Please concisely specify the type of scenery shot (e.g., a landscape or cityscape scenery shot) in a single fluent paragraph.Also explain why there is no main subject, such as the focus being on the environment, atmosphere, or scale rather than a specific object. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.

Please avoid using phrases like "the first frame" or "the last frame" in your description. Instead, refer to the entire sequence simply as "the video." Your description should integrate observations from all frames into a cohesive, temporally and logically consistent narrative, rather than describing frames in isolation. Whenever you mention a subject, be sure to include detailed descriptions of its key visual attributes. The final output should be a single, fluent paragraph describing the video, with no Markdown formatting or introductory text. Don't mention the surroundings or the subject's motion unless necessary to distinguish subjects by location, action, or relationship.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a dramatic landscape scenery shot capturing a massive, turbulent storm system moving across a vast, flat prairie. The sky is dominated by a swirling, layered supercell cloud, with dark, ominous gray and teal tones contrasting with brighter white sections above. Sheets of rain are visible falling in the distance, partially obscuring a sliver of golden light on the far horizon. There is no main subject, as the focus is on the immense scale and powerful atmosphere of the weather phenomenon itself, dwarfing the expansive, grassy landscape below.

generated_critique: While the caption accurately identifies this as a landscape shot focused on a storm and correctly notes the absence of a primary subject, it misses several key visual details that define the scene's composition and dynamism. The description of the storm as "moving" is too general; the video appears to be a time-lapse, showing the supercell's distinct, rapid rotation and the churning evolution of its cloud layers, which is a crucial aspect of the visual experience. The caption fails to mention the frequent, brilliant flashes of in-cloud lightning that periodically illuminate the storm's internal structure from within, nor the several distinct bolts of lightning that fork down to the horizon. Furthermore, the description of the "expansive, grassy landscape" is incomplete. A prominent, unpaved dirt road winds from the bottom of the view towards the storm, acting as a strong leading line that draws the eye. In the mid-ground, a tiny, solitary farmhouse is visible, and its inclusion would have provided a concrete sense of scale to support the claim that the storm is "dwarfing" the landscape, rather than just stating it. Finally, while descriptive, the use of subjective terms like "dramatic," "ominous," and "powerful" could be replaced by more objective descriptions of the storm's rapid movement and the lightning to adhere more closely to the instructions.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This video captures a time-lapse of a massive supercell storm system rapidly rotating and evolving across a vast, flat prairie. The sky is filled with swirling, layered clouds in dark gray and teal tones, contrasting with brighter white sections above. Frequent flashes of in-cloud lightning illuminate the storm's internal structure, while distinct bolts of lightning fork down to the horizon. Sheets of rain fall in the distance, partially obscuring a sliver of golden light on the far horizon. A prominent, unpaved dirt road winds from the bottom of the view towards the storm, serving as a leading line that draws the eye. In the mid-ground, a tiny, solitary farmhouse provides a concrete sense of scale, emphasizing the immense size of the storm as it dominates the expansive, grassy landscape below.
